name: Avoid using break statement in FOR loops (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Methods and Functions containing a break statement in a FOR loop.
output:
"This report lists all the Methods and Functions containing a break statement in a FOR loop.

This QR provides the following information:
Method and Function  full name."
rationale: In the source code a FOR loop must be easy to read. Using break statements in FOR loops makes them much more difficult to read.
remediation: Try to remove the 'break' statements from the loop and to manage the end-of-loop within the loop condition part.
